hero.title: This is the boilerplate built on top of Next.js
hero.subtitle: A modern, production-ready starter template for building fast and scalable web applications with Next.js, featuring server-side rendering, API routes, and optimized performance out of the box.

items.title: Server-Side Rendering (SSR)
items.description: Next.js provides built-in server-side rendering capabilities, improving SEO and initial page load performance by rendering pages on the server.

items.title: Static Site Generation (SSG)
items.description: Generate static pages at build time for optimal performance. Perfect for blogs, documentation, and content-heavy sites with pre-rendered HTML.

items.title: API Routes
items.description: Build full-stack applications with Next.js API routes. Create backend endpoints without a separate server, keeping everything in one codebase.

items.title: Image Optimization
items.description: Automatic image optimization with the Next.js Image component, reducing bandwidth usage and improving page load times with lazy loading and responsive images.

items.title: File-Based Routing
items.description: Intuitive file-based routing system. Create routes by adding files to the pages or app directory - no configuration needed.

items.title: Built-in CSS Support
items.description: Support for CSS Modules, Sass, and Tailwind CSS out of the box. Style your application with your preferred approach.

testimonials.title: Why Next.js?
testimonials.quote: Next.js is a React framework that enables you to build full-stack web applications. It provides the best developer experience with features like automatic code splitting, optimized production builds, and seamless deployment to Vercel or any Node.js hosting.
testimonials.author: Next.js Framework

items.question: What is Next.js?
items.answer: Next.js is a React framework for production that gives you building blocks to create web applications. It handles the tooling and configuration needed for React, and provides additional structure, features, and optimizations for your application.

items.question: What makes this boilerplate special?
items.answer: This boilerplate comes pre-configured with best practices, internationalization support, modern UI components, and a clean project structure. It's ready to use out of the box, saving you hours of setup time.

items.question: Can I use this for production?
items.answer: Yes! This boilerplate is designed with production in mind, including performance optimizations, SEO-friendly setup, and scalable architecture patterns.

cta.title: Ready to build your Next.js application?
cta.description: Start building fast, scalable web applications with this production-ready Next.js boilerplate. Get up and running in minutes.
